sourceMeaningMnemonic: You grab a <radical>satellite</radical> with your <radical>fingers</radical> and <kanji>shake</kanji> it! You're an astronaut and it's your job. Don't worry, the satellite won't break or anything, it's strong for space travel. Just do as you're told and shake the sucker.
meaningInfo: Imagine being in space and shaking a satellite with your fingers.
readingMnemonic: You need to <kanji>shake</kanji> it because this satellite is full of <reading>yo</reading>gurt (<ja>よう</ja>). And you only like yogurt that's been well shook. And who can resist space yogurt? Huh? Anyone?
readingInfo: Imagine shaking yogurt in space. Now imagine eating yogurt as it continues to shake (in space still)!
